item.title: Useful: Stay Safe On Pika Network
item.author: invalid@example.com (PyroInDaBus)
item.dc:creator: PyroInDaBus
item.content:encoded:
Stay Safe On Pika Network

Throughout my 8 years on this server, I've mostly been annoyed by a persistent issue, autoclicking cheaters. Admitting that I'm not exempt from making mistakes like many of you, I've faced consequences for my actions. This experience lead me to create this thread, aiming to keep you informed, ensure your safety, and help you understand the functionality, usage, and detection of cheats for effective reporting, as well as keeping your account safe and...

Then automatically ban/mute the players who typed them.
